page.title: 05CLUBS
page.content:
CIRENCESTER PARK IS USED FOR MANY FUND RAISING EVENTS BY LOCAL GROUPS. {SPONSORED WALKS AND RIDES}ARE ORGANISED BY:- {THE HOME FARM TRUST, {THE WORLD WILDLIFE TRUST, {CIRENCESTER ROUND TABLE, {CIRENCESTER LION'S CLUB.
THE{BRITISH HORSE SOCIETY}HOLD THEIR DRIVING TRIALS IN THE PARK AND {THE VALE OF THE WHITE HORSE HUNT}USE THE PARK FOR THEIR HUNTER TRIALS.
MANY{CARAVAN CLUBS}HOLD{RALLIES IN THE PARK. SEVERAL ARE LOCAL GROUPS BUT OTHERS ARE NATIONAL GROUPS SUCH AS THE VOLVO OWNERS CARAVAN CLUB. MOTOR CYCLE EVENTS ARE ALSO HELD.
